commit_message:
Set tempestconf centos-8 jobs as NV

Tempestconf has hardcoded [1] usage of publicURL without any option to
rewrite that. This results in CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED since we don't
have trusted certificate for public endpoint.

[1] https://opendev.org/osf/python-tempestconf/src/branch/master/config_tempest/clients.py#L106

Change-Id: I29ecf06fc625ef0d93424ce8e04bb592cb2ce07b

subject: Remove FIP agent's gw port when L3 agent is deleted
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2021-06-24 07:00:12.000000000', 'files': ['neutron/db/agents_db.py', 'neutron/tests/unit/db/test_l3_dvr_db.py', 'neutron/db/l3_dvr_db.py', 'neutron/objects/ports.py'], 'message': "Remove FIP agent's gw port when L3 agent is deleted

Floating IP agent gateway ports are created for each external network
for each node where DVR L3 agent is running and where there is some FIP
from the ext_net.
But even, if L3 agent is removed (e.g. when scaling down the cluster),
such floating IP gateway port is never removed so it consumes IP address
from the external network.

With this patch when the DVR L3 agent is deleted, all such fip gateway
ports owned by that agent will be deleted.
When new L3 agent is created (registered in the DB), Neutron will check
if there are any floating IPs on that host and will recreate such FIP
gateway ports for it.

Conflicts:
    neutron/tests/unit/db/test_l3_dvr_db.py

Closes-Bug: #1891360
Change-Id: If6ef990baf039c556d7420962ac4c54608711f06
(cherry picked from commit 8cc7c0cf7a5196103b097fae67eccbd5dc3980ac)
"}]
commit_message:
Remove FIP agent's gw port when L3 agent is deleted

Floating IP agent gateway ports are created for each external network
for each node where DVR L3 agent is running and where there is some FIP
from the ext_net.
But even, if L3 agent is removed (e.g. when scaling down the cluster),
such floating IP gateway port is never removed so it consumes IP address
from the external network.

With this patch when the DVR L3 agent is deleted, all such fip gateway
ports owned by that agent will be deleted.
When new L3 agent is created (registered in the DB), Neutron will check
if there are any floating IPs on that host and will recreate such FIP
gateway ports for it.

Conflicts:
    neutron/tests/unit/db/test_l3_dvr_db.py

Closes-Bug: #1891360
Change-Id: If6ef990baf039c556d7420962ac4c54608711f06
(cherry picked from commit 8cc7c0cf7a5196103b097fae67eccbd5dc3980ac)

subject: Disable selinux defaults enforcement in File/Concat resources
revisions:
[{'number': 3, 'created': '2021-01-11 12:21:12.000000000', 'files': ['fixtures/scenario001.pp', 'fixtures/scenario002.pp', 'fixtures/scenario003.pp', 'fixtures/scenario004.pp'], 'message': "Disable selinux defaults enforcement in File/Concat resources

Last selinux-policy in CentOS Stream adds patch for [1] which modifies
default context for symlinks under /etc/httpd. That's breaking
idempotency for files created with File/Concat resources under that directory
because of [2].

This patch is disabling default selinux context enforcement for all
File/Concat resources until we have a fix for [2].

[1] https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1900650
[2] https://tickets.puppetlabs.com/browse/PUP-7559

Change-Id: Ic92889cc480c316df9454186ffadf3a77fd8ed26
"}]
commit_message:
Disable selinux defaults enforcement in File/Concat resources

Last selinux-policy in CentOS Stream adds patch for [1] which modifies
default context for symlinks under /etc/httpd. That's breaking
idempotency for files created with File/Concat resources under that directory
because of [2].

This patch is disabling default selinux context enforcement for all
File/Concat resources until we have a fix for [2].

[1] https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1900650
[2] https://tickets.puppetlabs.com/browse/PUP-7559

Change-Id: Ic92889cc480c316df9454186ffadf3a77fd8ed26

Floating IP agent gateway ports are created for each external network
for each node where DVR L3 agent is running and where there is some FIP
from the ext_net.

subject: Don't depend on 'nodes' in get_extra_node.py
reviewers: [{'_account_id': 8367, 'name': 'Arx Cruz', 'email': 'arxcruz@redhat.com', 'username': 'arxcruz'}, {'_account_id': 8449, 'name': 'Marios Andreou', 'email': 'marios.andreou@gmail.com', 'username': 'marios'}, {'_account_id': 8833, 'name': 'Rabi Mishra', 'email': 'ramishra@redhat.com', 'username': 'rabi'}, {'_account_id': 9592, 'name': 'wes hayutin', 'email': 'whayutin@redhat.com', 'username': 'weshayutin'}, {'_account_id': 10969, 'name': 'Shnaidman Sagi (Sergey)', 'display_name': 'Shnaidman Sagi', 'email': 'sshnaidm@redhat.com', 'username': 'sergsh'}, {'_account_id': 14985, 'name': 'Alex Schultz', 'email': 'aschultz@next-development.com', 'username': 'mwhahaha'}, {'_account_id': 22348, 'name': 'Zuul', 'username': 'zuul', 'tags': ['SERVICE_USER']}, {'_account_id': 23181, 'name': 'RDO Third Party CI', 'email': 'dmsimard+rdothirdparty@redhat.com', 'username': 'rdothirdparty', 'tags': ['SERVICE_USER']}, {'_account_id': 29775, 'name': 'Sandeep Yadav', 'email': 'sandyada@redhat.com', 'username': 'sandeepyadav93'}]
revisions:
[{'number': 3, 'created': '2021-06-22 12:00:44.000000000', 'files': ['roles/tripleo-inventory/files/get_extra_node.py'], 'message': "Don't depend on 'nodes' in get_extra_node.py

In change Ifc36d15b72c7421d7e0ec810d1ead17f4232b3ab
nodes with no BMC is no longer added to the 'nodes'
section by build_nodes_json.py. Setting the BMC to
OS::Heat::None will reduce the resources we use in
CI since we will no longer spin up the unused OVB
virtual BMC isntance for the extra role.

The get_extra_node.py relies on the extra node being
present in the 'nodes' section. This will no longer
work once the change in OVB lands.

This change refactors get_extra_node.py to get the
extra node IP by relying on the 'network_details'
field only.

Also do sys.exit(0) after printing the IP. We don't
need to keep iterating over all the node nets, and
nodes once we found the match.

Change-Id: I824b25b7d32fd2f7745438ce3fdccba6cdd36335
"}]
commit_message:
Don't depend on 'nodes' in get_extra_node.py

In change Ifc36d15b72c7421d7e0ec810d1ead17f4232b3ab
nodes with no BMC is no longer added to the 'nodes'
section by build_nodes_json.py. Setting the BMC to
OS::Heat::None will reduce the resources we use in
CI since we will no longer spin up the unused OVB
virtual BMC isntance for the extra role.

The get_extra_node.py relies on the extra node being
present in the 'nodes' section. This will no longer
work once the change in OVB lands.

This change refactors get_extra_node.py to get the
extra node IP by relying on the 'network_details'
field only.

Also do sys.exit(0) after printing the IP. We don't
need to keep iterating over all the node nets, and
nodes once we found the match.

Change-Id: I824b25b7d32fd2f7745438ce3fdccba6cdd36335

commit_message:
Remove from master the ceph-ansible references

Ceph-ansible is not used anymore in master.
This change aligns the quickstart tool to make sure only
cephadm is used to deploy Ceph.

Change-Id: I5565d0e6aecdb0443a8c0f334fa77d142248e430

subject: Cache AgentClient on Task, not globally
reviewers: [{'_account_id': 11076, 'name': 'Shivanand Tendulker', 'email': 'stendulker@gmail.com', 'username': 'stendulker'}, {'_account_id': 11292, 'name': 'Arne Wiebalck', 'email': 'Arne.Wiebalck@cern.ch', 'username': 'wiebalck'}, {'_account_id': 11655, 'name': 'Julia Kreger', 'email': 'juliaashleykreger@gmail.com', 'username': 'jkreger', 'status': 'Flying to the moon with a Jetpack!'}, {'_account_id': 22348, 'name': 'Zuul', 'username': 'zuul', 'tags': ['SERVICE_USER']}]
revisions:
[{'number': 3, 'created': '2021-06-25 08:58:19.000000000', 'files': ['ironic/drivers/modules/agent.py', 'ironic/drivers/modules/agent_client.py', 'ironic/drivers/modules/agent_base.py', 'ironic/tests/unit/drivers/modules/test_agent_base.py', 'ironic/drivers/modules/ansible/deploy.py', 'ironic/tests/unit/drivers/modules/test_agent.py', 'releasenotes/notes/cache-agentclient-per-task-ec2231684e6876d9.yaml'], 'message': 'Cache AgentClient on Task, not globally

In order to avoid potential cache coherency issues
when using a globally cached AgentClient, e.g. with
TSL certificates from the IPA, cache the AgentClient
on a per task basis.

Co-Authored-By: Arne Wiebalck <arne.wiebalck@cern.ch>

Story: #2009004
Task: #42678

Change-Id: I0c458c8d9ae673181beb6d85c2ee68235ccef239
'}]
commit_message:
Cache AgentClient on Task, not globally

In order to avoid potential cache coherency issues
when using a globally cached AgentClient, e.g. with
TSL certificates from the IPA, cache the AgentClient
on a per task basis.

Co-Authored-By: Arne Wiebalck <arne.wiebalck@cern.ch>

Story: #2009004
Task: #42678

Change-Id: I0c458c8d9ae673181beb6d85c2ee68235ccef239

subject: Switch project management in cloud to proxy
revisions:
[{'number': 6, 'created': '2021-06-22 10:35:23.000000000', 'files': ['openstack/cloud/_identity.py', 'openstack/identity/v3/project.py', 'openstack/tests/unit/cloud/test_caching.py', 'openstack/tests/unit/cloud/test_role_assignment.py', 'openstack/tests/unit/cloud/test_project.py', 'openstack/tests/unit/cloud/test_domain_params.py', 'openstack/tests/unit/base.py', 'openstack/cloud/_network.py'], 'message': 'Switch project management in cloud to proxy

Do required switch now for identity.project in the cloud layer.
Drop separate identity v2 support from cloud layer. It is relatively
expensive to maintain with with most likely nobody using it. Also adding
new v3 features into the shim layer is getting increasingly complex.

Change-Id: Ied4ccaea3e357c59f422e058e4c9dfe105024f82
'}]
commit_message:
Switch project management in cloud to proxy

Do required switch now for identity.project in the cloud layer.
Drop separate identity v2 support from cloud layer. It is relatively
expensive to maintain with with most likely nobody using it. Also adding
new v3 features into the shim layer is getting increasingly complex.

Change-Id: Ied4ccaea3e357c59f422e058e4c9dfe105024f82

commit_message:
Refactor DHCP common config options

Align the config with DHCP agent options `dhcp_renewal_time`
and `dhcp_rebinding_time` for ovs-agent dhcp extension.

Partially-Implements: bp/distributed-dhcp-for-ml2-ovs
Related-Bug: #1900934

Change-Id: I671f23fcb763b847b1dc2b1d2de0567569aba892
